summary: Completed comprehensive testing of StartupManager Pro - authentication, dashboard, navigation, and core features working. Backend APIs 78.6% success rate, frontend navigation and UI functional with minor issues.

timeout_issues.issue: AI endpoints timing out after 10 seconds
timeout_issues.impact: AI features not accessible to users
timeout_issues.note: Likely due to AI processing time exceeding timeout - not a critical system failure

timeout_issues.impact: Orange Money payment method not working

navigation_issues.issue: Navigation to POS redirects back to dashboard

ui_bugs.issue: Theme toggle in settings page not fully functional
ui_bugs.note: Theme toggle on login page works correctly

loading_issues.issue: Some pages show loading spinner but don't fully load content

high_priority: Fix POS page navigation - users cannot access POS functionality
Investigate AI endpoint timeouts - increase timeout or optimize AI processing
medium_priority: Resolve page loading issues in Settings and POS
Improve theme toggle functionality in settings
low_priority: Optimize AI response times for better user experience
